label: AB_mC8_12_i_i-002
title: Monoclinic ZrCl Structure
comments:
(Adolphson, 1976) put ZrCl in space group $C2$ \#5, but since the set the $y$-coordinates of both atoms to zero there is an inversion site and the space group becomes $C2/m$ \#12. 
 ZrCl can also be found in a \href{current_web_home_dir/AB_hR4_166_c_c-005}{rhombohedral structure}.
